imdb.plot outline: A military genius for the insurgents during the Mexican War of Independence, José María Morelos y Pavón, stirred up to rebellion the south of the Viceroyalty of New Spain and relinquish his spade to the congress -the one he contributed to create-, honoring in that way the title he was given: "the servant of the Nation".
imdb.title: La lucha de José María Morelos
akas: La lucha de José María Morelos (Mexico)
plot: A military genius for the insurgents during the Mexican War of Independence, José María Morelos y Pavón, stirred up to rebellion the south of the Viceroyalty of New Spain and relinquish his spade to the congress -the one he contributed to create-, honoring in that way the title he was given: "the servant of the Nation".::Clío TV
